GOVERNOR'S OFFICE
RALEIGH
W. Kerr Scott
GOVERNOR
October 21, 1952
Mr. Frank E. Schooley, Treasurer
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Office of Executive Director
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Schooley:
I have had the opportunity of closely observing the
activities of Mr. Earl Wynn for the past four years.
My observations lead me to recommend him very
highly for any position involving educational technique development and
promotion, particularly in the fields of radio and television.
In addition to his outstanding leadership in the work
and administration of the Communication Center of the University of
North Carolina, Mr. Wynn has made a major contribution to education
in North Carolina through his direction of the studies of the North Carolina
Communication Commission in the field of audio-visual aids in educational
processes.
His warm personality, his sound imagination, and proved
administrative ability make him a valuable citizen of our State and staff
member of the University of North Carolina.
Sincerely,
WKS:blc
